title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Summer Fridays are dead because remote work killed them
items.description: Companies are using relaxed schedules and decreased productivity as excuses to reel back the warm weather benefit.

items.title: What to Know About the Heat Wave in Europe
items.description: Some parts of Western Europe were starting to cool off as the extreme heat that has gripped the continent moved east.

items.title: Diogo Jota, Liverpool Soccer Star, Dies in Car Crash at 28
items.description: Mr. Jota and his brother André Filipe died in Spain, the authorities said. The crash came two weeks after the Portuguese player’s wedding.

items.title: 3 takeaways from a cardiologist and ‘SuperAgers’ researcher on how to live longer and healthier
